content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.1.\\tIn case the employee does not comply with any of the requirements set forth in clauses 2.1-2.3 of the Regulation for 30 minutes, the Company shall qualify the employee's act as non-fulfillment of the duties assigned to the employee without good reason.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.2.\\tIn case the employee does not comply with the requirement set forth in clauses 2.1-2.3 of the Regulation for 2 (two) consecutive hours, the Company shall qualify the employee's act as not showing up for work during the whole working day, for disrespectful reasons. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
